alert.note: Alert for Forest; Northern Marinette County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 2:39PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Forest and northern Marinette Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 238 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Woodlawn, or near Crandon, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crandon, Goodman, Woodlawn, North Otter Creek Natural Area, Laona, Wabeno, Silver Cliff, Armstrong Creek, Blackwell and Otter Springs Recreation Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
